title: Carrot cake with cream cheese glaze
ingredients: ['350g grated carrots', '4 eggs', '275ml vegetable oil', '400g caster sugar', '250g sifted plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '150g sultanas', 'Cream cheese glaze', '150g icing sugar', '75g cream cheese', '1 tablespoon golden syrup', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract']
